name: Pogo Knights
description:
Use your pogo skills to stab your opponents head and then plant it on the central pike to score!

You begin in a level select title screen, touch a diamond to play in that arena.

P1: "A" rotate left, "D" rotate right

P2: <- (left arrow) rotate left,  -> (right arrow) rotate right

"F" toggle fullscreen

"ESC" or "L" return to level select
